page.title: 04A TYPICAL DAY
page.content: Sophie is nearly 12. She lives in Ballater Village and goes to Ballater Primary School "I get up at 6.30. Feed my rabbit and guineapig with bran, carrots and lettuce. My goldfish has flakes of fishfood. My breakfast is a bowl of cereal. 8.30 go to school all day until 3.15. In class our books are handed out and we work till 11.00. At breaktime we play ball outside. Lunch is at 12.30. Primary 7 sit at the head of a table and serve the other children with lunch. In the afternoon we have a talk about Nature. We often go out to see plants. Get home at 3.30. Most days I go to Craigendarroch pool. After tea I watch T.V. Some evenings I go to Guides or Highland Dancing Classes. At about 9.00 I go to my bed."
